forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy and becoming windy with thunderstorms likely for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming windy with thunderstorms likely. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers early, then mainly cloudy after midnight with light rain possible. Low 9C. S winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers early, then mainly cloudy after midnight with light rain possible. Low 48F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
